turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Musselwhite mine.
turn.1: What were the working conditions at the Musselwhite mine?
turn.2: Due to the mine being a year-round operation these rotations entitle 168 working hours every 28 days, comparable to a standard 40-hour work week.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: This is in contrast to seasonal jobs in logging, oil drilling and mineral exploration where the rotations have longer "in" times but only run for part of the year.
turn.6: Transportation of personnel is contracted to Wasaya Airways.
turn.7: What kind of transportation did they use?
turn.8: The Dash 8 300 series was purchased by the airway specifically for the transportation of personnel from Thunder Bay to the mine.
turn.9: Is there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: Other service points to the mine include Pickle Lake and Sioux Lookout.
turn.11: What did the trucks look like?
turn.12: Material (fuel, parts, explosives, reactants for processing, etc.) transportation is done by truck from the south.
